meta.defaultDescription: Transform real-world assets into secure digital tokens in minutes. Your enterprise-ready platform for tokenizing bonds, equity, funds, and more — all compliant and under your control.

home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to your digital asset platform. Everything you need to tokenize, manage, and trade real-world assets with enterprise-grade security.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your command center for digital assets. Track performance, monitor portfolios, and manage everything in one powerful interface.

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: Explore your tokenized universe. Browse, manage, and interact with bonds, equity, funds, and all your digital assets in one place.

tokenFactory.title: Token factory
tokenFactory.description: Where digital assets come to life. Create new tokens with our secure smart contract system — it's easier than you think.

onboarding.title: Get started
onboarding.description: Your journey to digital asset mastery begins here. Set up your platform in minutes and start tokenizing real-world assets today.

signIn.title: Sign in
signIn.description: Welcome back! Securely access your digital asset platform and continue building the future of finance.

signUp.title: Create account
signUp.description: Ready to revolutionize how value is created and exchanged? Start your tokenization journey with just a few clicks.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Fine-tune your platform experience. Manage security, preferences, and system settings all in one convenient place.

socialMedia.defaultImageAlt: Asset Tokenization Kit - Transform real-world assets into digital tokens
